title: Squarish slab serif DRAFT
content:
Anyone know this one?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [draft.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163111/http:/typophile.com/files/draft.jpg) | 42.29 KB |

 [‹ Identity Theft type. Help ID.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163111/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33161 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sheraton Suites - font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163111/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33160 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dohdoh

comments.content: Looks old and unavailable, but if you won’t miss the serif brackets you can get close with [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/dispatch_bold/&sample_text=D%20R%20A%20F%20T&sample_size=36).

I’ve been seeing it around NYC in a campaign by the NFL for their DRAFT. Here is the logo, but they also use it in headlines.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163111im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2006_04_sports_nfl_draft_logo_4947.jpg)
